English: I will try to understand what is happening.
I do not know the reason.
This happened a short time ago.
We will see what happens later.
It is not easy to make a decision.
I am still waiting for the reply.
It is better to start now.

Arabic: كان من الممكن أن يكون الأمر أسوأ.

English: It is clear that there is a problem.
This is what I was looking for.
There is no need to worry.
I was not sure of the outcome.
People started talking about the matter.
It is difficult to explain that.
I feel that something has changed.
I do not agree with this.
I did not understand the idea well.
It is possible to try again.
I will explain to you later.
It was difficult to accept that.
I have not heard of this before.
